title: Old Faithful geyser erupts in Yellowstone National Park at sunset
description: Old Faithful geyser erupts in Yellowstone National Park at sunset
author: m01229
generated_description: A massive column of steam and hot water shoots high into the evening sky from a famous geyser. The dramatic eruption is silhouetted against a sunset sky with warm golden and orange hues. Tourists can be seen as small figures observing this spectacular natural phenomenon from a safe distance.
